column2: -1.3240776376556362 The Devil's Lapstone https://www.thisisdurham.com/inspire-me/durhams-unmissable-highlights/legends-of-durham/the-devil-s-lapstone Castle Eden Dene’s Devil’s Lapstone legend tells how the Devil
column4: flew through the ancient woodland gathering stones until his apron tore and a great rock tumbled from the sky. The stone still bears the scratches and blood he left trying to catch it—marks said to remain visible to anyone who seeks it along the Yew Tree Trail.
